title: Life is More Pleasant with Wine
creator_credit: Australian Wine and Brandy Corporation, Kingcroft Productions, John Kingsford-Smith and Jack Gardiner
brief_description: Presents the joys of drinking wine, a harmonious accompaniment to many activities. Suggests times, places and accompaniments for wine; discusses the qualities and features of each type of wine, the type of glass required; and how best to serve it.
